definition: a piece of soft material that covers and protects an injured part of the body, repair by adding pieces
details:
noun
- a piece of soft material that covers and protects an injured part of the body
= synonyms: bandage
- a protective cloth covering for an injured eye
= synonyms: eyepatch
- sewing that repairs a worn or torn hole (especially in a garment)
= synonyms: mend
- a piece of cloth used as decoration or to mend or cover a hole
- a connection intended to be used for a limited time
= synonyms: temporary hookup
- a small contrasting part of something
= synonyms: spot
- a short set of commands to correct a bug in a computer program
- a small area of ground covered by specific vegetation
= synonyms: plot, plot of land, plot of ground
- a period of indeterminate length (usually short) marked by some action or condition
= synonyms: piece, spell, while
verb
- repair by adding pieces
= synonyms: piece
- mend by putting a patch on
= example: mend by putting a patch on
= synonyms: patch up
- to join or unite the pieces of
= example: to join or unite the pieces of
= synonyms: piece
- provide with a patch
